overview.subHeader: Evolving the Vision and driving the Product
overview.description: Kyma consists of a number of different features that enable Kyma to be a ready-to-extend enterprise application in a cloud-native world. These features are grouped in different areas called Capabilities.

description: Kyma roadmap is dynamic and subject to changes. All information in the roadmap is provided for transparency and contribution purposes and does not constitute a binding offer or commitment. Kyma community reserves the right to modify the roadmap content at its sole discretion, at any time, depending on current needs.
If you see a feature you like but it has not been scheduled for any release yet, feel free to contact us on {slackLink} to talk about your use cases or contribution options.
